page.title: 12Police in the Community
page.content: Police have to wear certain uniforms. In summer they wear a short sleeved white shirt,black shoes or boots.They wear either a tall hat for walking and riding, but if they are driving they would wear a black flat hat with black and white checks.The women wear a flat white hat with black and white checks, a skirt and a shirt. When police work they usually have certain times, either night shift or if on a home beat they would work about eight hours.When Police have a home beat it means they have a certain area in which to patrol including their home which is usually about two miles by one mile.Most police if on a home beat would walk or cycle but otherwise they would be in a Panda car or even a Police van.
